title: Science Curriculum Design Integrating Sustainability and Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment utilizing digital devices for active professionals

learning_goals: Learners can plan and design e-learning content on sustainability using design thinking methodology.
Learners can convert science educational materials into practitioner-tailored activities through learner persona analysis.
Learners can develop interactive digital learning modules aligned with UN SDG 4 (Quality Education).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
